title: Leaverbuster needs to stop busting someone for bugsplat
body: My league client suffers from alot of bugsplats but i always rejoin games and finish them, this one time i get a bugsplat the moment we all lock in chmps and guess what happens? Bugsplat and turns out my client had corrupt files that needed repairing. Didnt find the corrupt files before lock in no no no found them after we were loading in game and now im leaver busted because although i didint leave the other games its still racked against me and thats somehow my fault that league crashed over and over.

replies.body:
The [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) system treats everyone equally regardless of it being intentional or a crash, because being away still causes others a negative experience.  Right now, your best chance is to take a break from matchmade games until this crash gets resolved.  

Bugsplats can happen for a variety of reasons like bad drivers or even game files.  You should go over the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to get this fixed up, and test it in a custom until you're sure the bugsplats are gone.  I hope that helps!
